about_the_game:
An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD GRAPHICS and realistic-looking characters.
Tony and his two assistants jet off to an overseas conference aboard the company’s luxurious private jet. The Mile High Club welcomes them in great style.

GAME DESCRIPTION
Meet Tony and embark on his wild Sex Adventure as he rediscovers life as a single guy.

EPISODE 7

A business conference across the ocean presents Tony with the perfect opportunity to indulge in the company’s luxurious private jet. However, this time he won’t be traveling alone.
Kyle and Henry, Tony’s new handsome assistants, will be on board to ensure their boss has a memorable flight.

Will Tony accept Kyle’s invitation to join the exclusive Mile High Club?
Will Henry be swayed to join them?
Follow Tony’s Sex Adventure and find out!

FEATURES

- HD renders
- Image gallery

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults and includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over.
Contains nudity, alternative lifestyles, graphic depictions  of oral, anal, masturbation and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids.
Contains gay sex scenes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
